column4: I'm trying to mount a network drive "like a samba" anyone know how I can do that?
lol!!! good one
but in all seriouslness
I'm already mounted ur bitch
alright in all seriousness is there a way to mount a windows network drive?
I have samba installed
:D
I need to mount it
sudo mount /location /mnt/fatx
however, how what is the location of my network drive?
smbfs itself has limits that I found out about the hard way (like 2gb file size limits)
we already covered the fact that there may be girls in here...  but then there may not be... hard to say
i suggest using the cifs file system in your mount command... you will need samba installed
CIFS is the common internet file system format, which is basically super-Server-Message-Block filesystem
cool.  Now get someone to help me with my lack of audio and we'll be even!
can we talk in a room
you know about alsa schtuff?
oh, i see... yeah, if you want... though it is possible someone else may benefit from infos on mounting windows network shares
invite me if you like
you get the dcc chat request?
try /join #EriccMojo
